item.title: Jin doy (jian dui) (sesame balls red bean)
item.description: Related: Recipes tried in 2022 Rice flour (green writing) Red bean paste Toasted sesame seeds Sesame oil https://cookingwithdog.com/recipe/sesame-balls-goma-dango/ Oh! I think Aunty Elsa gave me tips the year I made the cha guo! (N.B. sweet cha guo with red bean seems to be a Hakka recipe https://bymargk.blogspot.com/2018/04/sweet-hakka-cha-guo-with-red-bean.html) Hereâ€™s what she wrote to me… Hi Julia I never made those but it’s same dough as Jin doys. Just have to use pink colouring roll into balls and fill with Do SAR (red bean sweet paste from a tin) or.
